name: Kid's Apron (KA7)
description:
Who doesn't like spending some time in the kitchen with their child cooking up a storm?...

This appliqued aprons is made from 100% cotton and comes with a bonus cookie cutter!  The apron has two pockets at the bottom.  It will fit children aged 3+.

The apron is machine washable in a normal load!

Important information re postage of multiple items: The big cartel site does not automatically calculate multiple item postage!  So if you are overcharged for postage, a refund of the overcharged amount will be sent with your goods.  Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience.

name: Gardener's Tool Belt (GTB6)
description:
The Gardener's tool belts are made with sturdy denim, cotton and tie around your child's waist with strong webbed strapping.  There is also a loop on the side for your child to hang their gardening fork in for easier access!

The Gardener's tool belts make great presents for the little green thumb in your family.  Not only are they fun, but they are a wonderful way for children to role play, use their imagination and to learn some beneficial skills...gardening!!

Each tool belt comes with 3 tools and a little something extra!

Important information re postage of multiple items: The big cartel site does not automatically calculate multiple item postage!  So if you are overcharged for postage, a refund of the overcharged amount will be sent with your goods.  Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience.

name: Busy Wallet (FMBW6)
description:
The Busy Wallets are fantastic to occupy your child/ren in the car on long trips, when out for dinner, at an appointment or to take on holidays.  
 
Each Busy Wallet includes: 
8 x textas
1 x notepad
1 x notebook

The Busy Wallet easily unties, and unfolds for your child/ren to use and then simply folds back up into thirds and ties up at the side for easy storage.  The fit well in the nappy bag, handbag or pram when out and about! The Flopsy Mopsy Busy Wallets help develop creativity, imagination and fine motor skills.

Important information re postage of multiple items: The big cartel site does not automatically calculate multiple item postage!  So if you are overcharged for postage, a refund of the overcharged amount will be sent with your goods.  Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience.

name: Nappy and Wipes Strap (NWS5)
description:
This strap is a cute, convenient way to keep all your little ones' nappies and wipes from getting lost and ruined in your bag! 

They have a long velcro strip which makes for easy adjustment (carry as little as one nappy and case of wipes or as much as 5 nappies!)

These also make wonderful baby shower gifts.

Important information re postage of multiple items: The big cartel site does not automatically calculate multiple item postage!  So if you are overcharged for postage, a refund of the overcharged amount will be sent with your goods.  Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience.

name: Teabag Wallet (TBW8)
description:
Do you carry your own favourite teabags with you and are sick of them floating around in the bottom of your handbag and tasting like the contents of your bag?  Well here is something ideal for you...a teabag wallet that holds your teabags, sugar and coffee sachets and even your own spoon!!  The wallet has 6 pockets, folds together to protect the contents and fastens close into an ideal sized wallet for the handbag, picnic basket, glovebox, nappybag, etc........
